mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cosme(cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, adminno, cosme_cateno, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES(cosme_seq.nextval, #{brand}, #{cosmename}, sysdate, #{adminno}, #{cosme_cateno}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, adminno, cosme_cateno, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM cosme ORDER BY cosmeno DESC
